root: ^With the war behind you, you and Xzciar led a peaceful life together. Though, 'peaceful' was not something Xzciar quite understood.

^She soon began a career of their own where she traveled across the world to perform their parkour skills across the land. It's a bit hectic, but you enjoy getting to see more of the world than you ever had before, and you find yourself relentlessly impressed by Xzciar's shows.
^Though she has not ignored your career, either. With her support, you grew your detective business and single handedly lowered the crime rate in the world.
^No one dared to act nefariously knowing that you would be around to catch them. But the best part of your day was always going home to be with Xzciar.
